title: Influence of Hiberno-Saxon on Early Medieveal art

content.question: This question is based on one or two slides. For a question involving two slides, when you are not asked specifically to name the artists and/or titles of the works, you may refer to the work on the left as (L) and the work on the right as (R). A response that answers the question directly will receive a higher score than one that simply lists characteristics or includes irrelevant points. Take a moment to read the question carefully before formulating your answer. Identify the culture or style of the manuscript page on the right. Discuss the art historical relationship between the two works shown.

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
